languages.text: {n}Перед вами стоит тощий человечек в рабочей одежде. Его лицо опухло от синяков, а несколько пальцев переломаны и торчат под странными углами. Водянистыми глазами он смотрит прямо перед собой.{/n}
languages.translation_comment:
"Гведон"
Выводим его к нам из толпы

"Гведон"
Выводим его к нам из толпы

languages.text: {n}Before you stands a gaunt man in work clothes. His face is swollen from the bruises, and several of his fingers are broken and sticking out at odd angles. He stares vacantly into the distance with watery eyes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Перед вами стоит тощий человечек в рабочей одежде. Его лицо опухло от синяков, а несколько пальцев переломаны и торчат под странными углами. Водянистыми глазами он смотрит прямо перед собой.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Before you stands a gaunt man in work clothes. His face is swollen from the bruises, and several of his fingers are broken and sticking out at odd angles. He stares off vacantly with watery eyes.{/n}

{n}Before you stands a gaunt man in work clothes. His face is swollen from the bruises, and several of his fingers are broken and sticking out at odd angles. He stares vacantly into the distance with watery eyes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Devant vous se tient un homme émacié en tenue de travail. Son visage meurtri par les coups est tuméfié, et plusieurs de ses doigts fracturés forment des angles improbables. Les yeux baignés de larmes, il fixe le vide d'un air hagard.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Before you stands a gaunt man in work clothes. His face is swollen from the bruises, and several of his fingers are broken and sticking out at odd angles. He stares vacantly into the distance with watery eyes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tienes delante a un hombre enjuto con ropa de trabajo. Tiene la cara hinchada por los golpes y varios dedos rotos doblados en ángulos extraños. Mira ausente al vacío con ojos llorosos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Before you stands a gaunt man in work clothes. His face is swollen from the bruises, and several of his fingers are broken and sticking out at odd angles. He stares vacantly into the distance with watery eyes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}一个穿着工作服、瘦骨嶙峋的男人被带到了你面前。他的脸被打肿了，几根手指也被打断了，以诡异的角度伸展着。他茫然地望着远处，眼中噙满了泪水。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Before you stands a gaunt man in work clothes. His face is swollen from the bruises, and several of his fingers are broken and sticking out at odd angles. He stares vacantly into the distance with watery eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}一个穿着工作服、瘦骨嶙峋的男人被带到了你面前。他的脸被打肿了，几根手指也被打断了，以诡异的角度伸展着。他茫然地望着远处，眼中噙满了泪水。{/n}

languages.text: {n} 目の前には作業着姿のやせ細った男が立っている。顔は腫れ上がっていて、指は何本か折れて奇妙な角度に突き出ている。彼はうるうるした目でぼんやりと遠くを見つめていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Before you stands a gaunt man in work clothes. His face is swollen from the bruises, and several of his fingers are broken and sticking out at odd angles. He stares vacantly into the distance with watery eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n} 目の前には作業着姿のやせ細った男が立っている。顔は腫れ上がっていて、指は何本か折れて奇妙な角度に突き出ている。彼はうるうるした目でぼんやりと遠くを見つめていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vor dir steht ein hagerer Mann in Arbeitskleidung. Sein Gesicht ist vor lauter Blutergüssen ganz angeschwollen, mehrere seiner Finger sind gebrochen und stehen in unnatürlichen Winkeln ab. Er starrt mit leeren, feuchten Augen in die Ferne.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Before you stands a gaunt man in work clothes. His face is swollen from the bruises, and several of his fingers are broken and sticking out at odd angles. He stares vacantly into the distance with watery eyes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Önünde işçi kıyafetleri giymiş, sıska bir adam duruyor. Yüzü, morluklardan şişmiş bir hâlde. Parmaklarından birkaçı kırılıp tuhaf şekilde yamulmuş. Sulu gözlerle uzaklara dalgınca bakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Before you stands a gaunt man in work clothes. His face is swollen from the bruises, and several of his fingers are broken and sticking out at odd angles. He stares vacantly into the distance with watery eyes.{/n}
